sourcesContent:
import { memo } from 'react' import './MoreInformationTour.scss' import { english, vietnamese } from '../../Languages/MoreInformationTour' import ReactQuill from 'react-quill'; import 'react-quill/dist/quill.bubble.css'; function MoreInformationTour({ languageSelected, tour, setTour }) { const languageList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese) const modules = { toolbar: [ ['bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'strike'], ['blockquote', 'code-block'], [{ 'header': 1 }, { 'header': 2 }], [{ 'list': 'ordered' }, { 'list': 'bullet' }], [{ 'script': 'sub' }, { 'script': 'super' }], [{ 'indent': '-1' }, { 'indent': '+1' }], [{ 'direction': 'rtl' }], [{ 'size': ['small', false, 'large', 'huge'] }], [{ 'header': [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, false] }], [{ 'color': [] }, { 'background': [] }], [{ 'font': [] }], [{ 'align': [] }], ['clean'], ] } const formats = [ 'header', 'font', 'background', 'color', 'code', 'size', 'bold', 'italic', 'underline', 'strike', 'blockquote', 'list', 'bullet', 'indent', 'script', 'align', 'direction', 'link', 'image', 'code-block', 'formula', 'video' ] return (
asd
right
) } export default memo(MoreInformationTour)
